A brief look at the progress of Parkinson’s research in 2018

2018 has been particularly rich for scientists working on Parkinson’s disease. Whether in the field of fundamental research (to gain new knowledge about the causes and mechanisms of the disease), or in clinical research (directly with patients), this year has brought a lot of hope for the Parkinson’s community.

Publication Date: 08 May 2019

Parkinson's disease - Symptoms and causes

Parkinson’s disease is a progressive nervous system disorder that affects movement. Parkinson’s disease affects the way you move. It happens when there is a problem with certain nerve cells in the brain.

Publication Date: 11 April 2019

Sheryl, 2019
